Recommendations.Title: Do you need planning permission? - Epping Forest District Council
Key Strengths: Guides users on when planning permission may be required.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides a straightforward guide to understanding whether or not planning permission is necessary, which directly addresses the user's initial question about council customer information needs.

Recommendations.Title: Renovating Your Home
Key Strengths: Discusses the impact of solar panels.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides a guide to home renovations and includes information about the role of solar panels, which can be relevant for council customers interested in energy-efficient improvements.

Recommendations.Title: Extensions – a homeowner's guide to extending your living space
Key Strengths: Provides information on extending living space.
Discusses solar panels and their benefits.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link discusses home extensions and mentions solar panels, which is likely to be relevant for council customers seeking advice about altering their homes.

Recommendations.Title: Untitled
Key Strengths: Case Officer's Report discussing a house with solar panels.
Recommendations.Reasoning: While not directly addressing customer needs, this case officer's report contains information about a property with solar panels that may be of interest to council customers interested in renewable energy development.

Recommendations.Title: Chapelfield Nursery Sewardstone Road Waltham Abbey E4 7RE
Key Strengths: Discusses the installation of solar panels at a nursery.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides information on a project involving the installation of solar panels, which could be relevant to council customers interested in similar ventures or renewable energy developments.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: While some items were potentially relevant for our given instruction, the top five recommendations were selected based on their direct relevance, clarity, and utility for addressing council customer information needs regarding solar panels and other sustainable energy solutions.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The chosen recommendations aim to provide information and guidance on a variety of topics related to solar panels and renewable energy development. This diverse selection ensures a comprehensive response to a wide range of potential inquiries from council customers.
